items.name: The Benue Canvas Collective
items.short_description: Discover the vibrant heart of Benue's contemporary art scene. This gallery showcases emerging local talents and modern Nigerian masterpieces in a striking new space.

items.name: Benue Sunset Boardwalk
items.short_description: Stroll along the newly developed boardwalk offering breathtaking views of the Benue River. Perfect for evening walks, picnics, and family outings with lush green spaces.
items.address: Near Wurukum Roundabout, Along Benue River Bank, Makurdi

items.name: Makurdi Playland Arena
items.short_description: A vibrant new entertainment center packed with arcade games, a state-of-the-art bowling alley, and a dedicated soft-play zone for younger children, promising fun for all ages.
items.address: Off Kashim Ibrahim Road, Near Benue State University, Makurdi

items.name: Taste of Benue Food Hall
items.short_description: Explore a culinary paradise featuring a diverse range of local delicacies and international flavors. This new food hall brings together the best of Makurdi's vibrant food scene under one roof.
items.address: Abu King Shuluwa Road, Opp. Benue Hotel, Makurdi

items.name: The Link Hub Makurdi
items.short_description: A contemporary co-working space and stylish cafe designed for freelancers, entrepreneurs, and anyone seeking a productive environment with excellent coffee and reliable internet.
items.address: Opposite NNPC Mega Station, Gboko Road, Makurdi

items.name: Makurdi Mini Golf Park
items.short_description: Putt your way through exciting challenges at Makurdi's newest mini-golf course. Perfect for family fun, group outings, and friendly competitions amidst a beautifully landscaped environment.
items.address: Along Makurdi-Gboko Road, Near Modern Market, Makurdi

items.name: Benue Ignite Tech Hub
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art facility fostering innovation and technology in Benue State. Offers incubation programs, workshops, and collaborative spaces for startups and tech enthusiasts.
items.address: Gen. Inienger Street, High Level, Makurdi

items.name: Green Harvest Sanctuary
items.short_description: Discover sustainable living at this serene eco-farm and wellness garden. Enjoy guided tours, fresh produce, and a farm-to-table cafe focused on healthy, local ingredients.
items.address: Outskirts of North Bank, Makurdi-Lafia Road, Makurdi

items.name: Silver Screen Makurdi
items.short_description: Experience cinema reimagined at this luxurious boutique film house. Featuring comfortable seating, gourmet snacks, and a curated selection of local and international films.
items.address: George Akume Road, Opposite Benue State Secretariat, Makurdi

items.name: Makurdi Heritage Crafts Village
items.short_description: A vibrant hub dedicated to preserving and promoting Benue's rich artistic heritage. Browse unique handmade crafts, meet local artisans, and find authentic souvenirs.
items.address: Near Lower Benue River Basin Development Authority, Makurdi
